messages.subject: Re: Screencaps
messages.msgSnippet: ... And I would  consider constructing  shrine in the dreaded babelfish s honor as a thank you.  Of course I would _seriously_ consider it if you were score a
messages.messageBody:
secretary wrote:

>I just uploaded 16 very general screencaps from Mibugishiden at SHQ
>Spy Division.>>
>
And I would consider constructing shrine in the dreaded babelfish's
honor as a thank you. Of course I would _seriously_ consider it if you
were score a naked picture of our beloved Mr. Sato....

>
>
>I can get more pics...
>

For a secretary you're such a tease LOL!

>For people who don't yet ~understand~ the IMPORTANCE of getting
>screencaps of Mibugishiden's Nagakura...:D
>
>
Thank you!!!!!

Barb (who ~understands~ the IMPORTANCE and appreciates each and every
one.....

messages.subject: Re: Screencaps
messages.msgSnippet: I just uploaded 16 very general screencaps from Mibugishiden at SHQ Spy Division. *I got a pic of Saitou kicking the guy who forgot to leave an empty seat at
messages.messageBody:
I just uploaded 16 very general screencaps from Mibugishiden at SHQ
Spy Division.

*I got a pic of Saitou kicking the guy who forgot to leave an empty
seat at the party (but really its because Saitou was angry about those
2 guys getting adopted--Okita was should've been Kondo's "heir" to
Tennen Rishin Ryu).

*got the cute pic of Nui giving Saitou a kiss too :D

But you wanted more?
Okay
http://www.streamload.com/secretarytocapt3
folder "Mibugishiden" zipped
Password makoto
file size 1.79 mb
with pics I didn't post at SHQ Spy Division

I can get more pics...basically the 2nd disk has TONS of behind the
scenes stuff including how they did CG effects on the seppuku scene,
Saitou getting shot and so on and so forth.

For some general use
http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/Mibuscreencaps/SatoasSaitou.jpg
http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/Mibuscreencaps/KoichiSato.jpg

For people who don't yet ~understand~ the IMPORTANCE of getting
screencaps of Mibugishiden's Nagakura...:D
http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/Mibuscreencaps/Nagakura4.jpg
still not convinced?
http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/Mibuscreencaps/Nagakura3.jpg
you should understand now...

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] PBS Special
messages.msgSnippet: *GROAN* WQED which I believe was one of the very first if not the first PBS station is not showing it. Stupid stupid QED If someone ends up taping this special
messages.messageBody:
*GROAN* WQED which I believe was one of the very first if not the first
PBS station is not showing it. Stupid stupid QED

If someone ends up taping this special please let me know so I can
grovel to borrow it or get a copy.....

--
Barbara Sheridan

http://www.barbarasheridan.net

messages.subject: PBS Special
messages.msgSnippet: I believe someone mentioned this sometime back so this is just a reminder that, Japan: Memoirs of a Secret Empire a 3 hour special will be shown tonight
messages.messageBody:
I believe someone mentioned this sometime back so this
is just a reminder that, "Japan: Memoirs of a Secret
Empire" a 3 hour special will be shown tonight
(Wednesday, May 26) on many pbs stations. It looks
like it will cover the whole Tokugawa era. Click the
second link to see if you get it in your area:

http://www.pbs.org/empires/japan/theprogram.html

http://www.pbs.org/empires/japan/program_6.html

Enjoy,

Kevin




__________________________________
Do you Yahoo!?
Friends. Fun. Try the all-new Yahoo! Messenger.
http://messenger.yahoo.com/

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Screencaps
messages.msgSnippet: *blots up copious amounts of aged fangirl drool from desk.* Thank you so much!!! Do you take requests? I d really love  to see a nice shot of the person who
messages.messageBody:
*blots up copious amounts of aged fangirl drool from desk.*

Thank you so much!!! Do you take requests? I'd really love to see a
nice shot of the person who played Nagakura Shinpachi

--
Barb (who is going to sigh wistfully and daydream some more over those screencaps)

messages.subject: Screencaps
messages.msgSnippet: I m using Powerdvd to do some screencaps of Mibugishiden and I have an entire cut scene uploaded at SHQ Spy Division in the Photos screencaps folder.  I
messages.messageBody:
I'm using Powerdvd to do some screencaps of Mibugishiden and I have an
entire cut scene uploaded at SHQ Spy Division in the Photos
"screencaps" folder. I numbered them in order.

Extra Photos I'm hosting

The guy behind Koichi Sato and Kiichi Nakai is Jiro Asada the novelist
who wrote Mibugishiden...the guy to the far right w/ the glasses is
the director of the movie
http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/Mibuscreencaps/formal1.jpg

For Koichi Sato Fans (in the navy blue kimono Barbara):
http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/Mibuscreencaps/formal2.jpg
http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/Mibuscreencaps/formal3.jpg
http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/Mibuscreencaps/formal4.jpg

http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/Mibuscreencaps/groupphoto1.jpg
http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/Mibuscreencaps/groupphoto2.jpg
http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/Mibuscreencaps/groupphoto3.jpg

Very informal press conference where Kiichi Nakai talks about
something profound (hogs the mic) and suddenly turns to Koichi Sato
who promptly wakes up and makes a comment :D
http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/Mibuscreencaps/interviewcollage.jpg
